sect2.title: Configuring the Number of Columns
sect2.para: Proceed as follows to configure the number of columns displayed in the overview table (workspace) of the respective view.

step.para:
Click on the column selection icon in the view navigation bar Icon for column selection
.

result.para: The columns available in the overview table in the workspace for the respective view are displayed in a separate dialog.

note.para: By default, all available columns for the respective view are displayed.

step.para: Untick the checkboxes to reduce the number of displayed columns in the overview table in the workspace.
The available columns depend on the respective view.
Click OK, to close the dialog and only display the selected columns in the overview table.

result.para: The changed settings for the column selection are applied without restart.
